name: Rode Fluoro-Free Liquid Glider Multigrade
description: Universal liquid product to be applied cold. Protects the ski-base and improves sliding. Spread it uniformly on the ski-base using the special dispenser pad, polish it with a cork, and you are ready to go.Works well in all types of snow, all snow and air humidity.Ideal with air temperature between -5 and -10°C.
